name: T.I.P.: Rumble Early Build
description:
After YEARS of working on this project, a build is finally here to be played! In a world where Demonic beings seep into the Overworld and threaten humanity as a whole, who else can step in but those born, raised, and trained to combat these monsters.

This is a 2D pixel art 1v1 Fighting Game, with mechanics akin to the Anime and Airdashers of the genre. There are a few characters, and a  couple of playable modes:

  • Versus - Play against another player (2P only)
  • Training - Practice the game's mechanics with another player (same as VS, but regeneration on the health)
  • Options - They don't work

FIND THE CONTROLS AND GAMEPLAY BASICS IN THE SCREENSHOTS (video guide for mechanics and fighters coming soon)

Lastly, I'd like to say Thanks for giving the build a try, and if you do, please leave some feedback, whether it be good or bad. I Worked on this project on an off for around 5 years, and throughout the last few months I pushed to get it decently playable. That being said, I know it's light on polish, especially the Character Select (something I plan on updating soon), There are known problems with the collision that i didn't get to solve, and there may be bugs and glitches (minor or major) present. Please let me know if you find anything in that regard.
